track.videotitle: How to Play Love The Way You Lie by Eminem and Rihanna on Guitar
track.description:
How to do the Steve Martin dance: http://bitly.com/stevemartindance http://www.mahalo.com/how-to-play-love-the-way-you-lie-by-eminem-and-rihanna-on-guitar Like us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/MahaloGuitar
If you enjoy listening to music from Eminem, you may also like to learn how to play songs from the artist. One song that is quite simple to learn to play on guitar is "Love The Way You Lie" which also features artist Rihanna. This song only uses a few chords and has no change ups or complex segments. This song is ideal for someone that is just learning to play.
 Rihanna teamed up with Eminem to record the hit single "Love the Way You Lie". From Eminem's 7th album, "Recovery" this song is the second single to have been released. The song climbed to #1 on the Billboard charts and gave each of the artists another number one single to add to their recording history. For Eminem, this track marks his 4th single to reach number...

track.videotitle: How To Play Iron Man By Black Sabbath On Guitar
track.description:
How to do the Steve Martin dance: http://bitly.com/stevemartindance http://www.mahalo.com/how-to-play-iron-man-by-black-sabbath-on-guitar Like us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/MahaloGuitar
Would you like to know how to play "Iron Man" by Black Sabbath on the guitar? Since its release in 1970, many bands have made a cover of "Iron Man." The song has also been used in many films, TV shows and sporting events. Since the 1976 release of We Sold Our Soul for Rock 'n' Roll, "Iron Man" has been included in subsequent Black Sabbath greatest hits compilations. The soundtrack of the 2008 comic book film Iron Man included the "Iron Man" song.4

track.videotitle: How to Two-Step in Hip Hop Dance
track.description:
There are multiple different types of two step in hip hop dance, including the basic, double, four corners, stepping out and the type you learned in the Find the Beat lesson. 
Basic Two Step
1. Start with your feet touching. Step to your right with your right foot, then bring your left foot over to meet it. Step to your left with your left foot, then bring your right foot over to meet it.
2. Repeat step one.
Double Two Step
1. Start with your feet touching. Step to your right with your right foot, then bring it back in to your left foot. Step to your right with your right foot again, then bring your left foot over to meet it.
2. Step to your left with your left foot, then bring it back in to your right foot. Step to your left with your left foot again, then bring your right foot over to meet it.
3. Repeat steps one and two.
Four Corners
1. Step forward and to your right with your right foot. Step forward and to your left with your left...
